title: Davey crockett

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Thanks i really do love this game just for these moments where we 3v5 and then we get blasted with toxicity right after the game is over, i might just end up actually killing myself if i see the next person type this to me. *Riot Do Something please*

replies.body: Yeouch, someone didn't take that match very well now, did they. I know these kinds of things can be pretty upsetting, and I do hope you were able to report him for that stuff while you were still in the post-game lobby. If you couldn't, feel free to shoot those screenshots over to us in a ticket and we can look through them and see what needs to happen!

Where do i send report tickets because there was another person i recently played with i called top lane first then he started saying No i go top lane and then we ended up Duo Laning, Then while we were duo laning he was trying to act really nice to me for some reason and said "Oh sorry buddy im top lane go do support" When i called top lane first, i know the rest of my team reported him but still, why do people have to ruin the game.
